definition: cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: Some people have played with the idea of boycotts .
sentences.chinese: 一些人已經和杯葛的主意玩。

sentences.english: China has threatened to boycott purchases of Airbus planes over the issue.
sentences.chinese: 中國已威脅會就此杯葛購買空中巴士飛機。

sentences.english: Neither, of course, do I wish to see my books subjected to a boycott .
sentences.chinese: 當然，我同樣也不希望看到我的書被人抵制杯葛。

sentences.english: Georgia's president Mikhail Saakashvili has already hinted at a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 格魯吉亞總統薩卡什維利已經暗示要杯葛冬奧會。

sentences.english: The angry players boycotted the football game.
sentences.chinese: 這些生氣的球員杯葛這次足球比賽。

definition: Legislative Yuan, the legislative branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
abbr. for 立法委員會|立法委员会[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]/abbr. for 立法委員|立法委员[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2]
DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
Ko Wen-je (1959-), Taiwanese independent politician, Mayor of Taipei City from 2014
joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)
army, civil service and education/all branches of state employment
